description: Automated metrics pipeline covering the XP experiment roadmap.

stages.name: baseline
stages.description: Reference runs using the standard search defaults.

stages.name: xp2_xp7_stability
stages.description: Re-run stability suite after adjusting aspiration, ordering, LMR and TT policy.
stages.notes: Apply XP-2, XP-6, XP-3 and XP-7 heuristics before executing this stage.

stages.name: xp1_xp8_blitz
stages.description: Blitz oriented checks with time clamp, late move pruning and selective quiescence.
stages.notes: Enable XP-1, XP-5 and XP-8 settings before running.

stages.name: xp9_xp10_safeguards
stages.description: Optional evaluation and root-bias checks triggered when instability is observed.
stages.notes: Run only if logs indicate erratic evaluation swings or root bias.
